0.user_question: Rita hand-picks Junebugs off of her plants every summer.  On Monday, she removed 1837748 Junebugs.  On both Tuesday and Wednesday, she removed twice as many Junebugs as she did on Monday.  Thursday she removed 48 and on Friday she removed 57.  What is the average number of Junebugs that she removes per day?

ost_step.1: On Monday Rita picked up 1837748 junebugs.
ost_step.2: On Tuesday and Wednesday she picked up double what she collected on Monday, so it would be 1837748 * 2 for each of these two days which equals (1837748*2)*2= 7350992.
ost_step.3: Adding this to Monday’s count we get; 7350992+1837748 = 9188740 Junebugs from Monday through Wednesday together.
ost_step.4: She also picked up 48 June bugs on Thursday but not any on Friday meaning only one value needs consideration here which was 48.

0.user_question: Rita hand-picks Junebugs off of her plants every summer.  On Monday, she removed 1837748 Junebugs.  On both Tuesday and Wednesday, she removed twice as many Junebugs as she did on Monday.  Thursday she removed 48 and on Friday she removed 57.  What is the average number of Junebugs that she removes per day?

ost_step.1: On Monday Rita picked up 1837748 junebugs.
ost_step.2: On Tuesday and Wednesday she picked up double what she collected on Monday, so it would be 1837748 * 2 for each of these two days which equals (1837748*2)*2= 7350992.

direct_answer.text:
Let's calculate this systematically:
On Monday, she picks up 1837748 Junebugs.
Tuesday & Wednesday combined yield double of Monday => (1837748 * 2) * 2 = 7350992 Junebugs.
Thursday yields another 48 Junebugs while Friday adds 57 Junebugs making them a sum of 48+57=105 Junebugs.
In all weeks together we get 1837748(Monday)+7350992(Tue&Wed)+105(Fri)=9189742 Junebugs over 5 days.
To find out our daily mean value; divide above figure by no.of days i.e., Mean_value=(Total)/no_days=>Mean_(daily)_junebug_removal:=  9189742/5==-> Meanshe collects around 1837948.4 June bugs daily on average.(Approximately).

subanswer.text: Let's think step by step. On Monday, Rita removes 1837748 Junebugs. On both Tuesday and Wednesday, she removes twice this amount per day.
